newsitem.title: USA: Walden shareholders OK acquisition by UST.
newsitem.headline: Walden shareholders OK acquisition by UST.

text.p: Walden Bancorp Inc said Wednesday its shareholders had voted to approve the acquisition of the company by UST Corp.
The transaction, which will be accounted for as pooling of interests, is structured as a tax-free exchange of 1.9 shares of UST common for each share of Walden common, Walden said.
The Federal Reserve approved the acquisition on December 2.
